languages.text: "В чем-то ваш несанкционированный ксенос прав, Вольный Торговец. В чем-то... но не во всем. Империум заполучит силу этого существа. И обратит ее против врагов своих".
"Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."
languages.original_text: "В чем-то ваш несанкционированный ксенос прав, Вольный Торговец. В чем-то... но не во всем. Империум заполучит силу этого существа. И обратит ее против врагов своих".

traits.locale_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she's right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."
"Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she's right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

"Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

languages.text: «Lo que su xenos no autorizada dice tiene sentido, Comerciante Independiente, pero... eso no significa que tenga razón. El Imperium domará el poder de esta criatura y la dirigirá contra nuestros enemigos».
languages.original_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Lo que su xenos no autorizada dice tiene sentido, Comerciante Independiente, pero... eso no significa que tenga razón. El Imperium domará el poder de esta criatura y la dirigirá contra nuestros enemigos».

languages.text: « Votre xénos non autorisée soulève un point pertinent, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Et... je ne veux pas dire par là qu'elle a raison. L'Imperium maîtrisera le pouvoir de la créature et l'utilisera contre nos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Votre xénos non autorisée soulève un point pertinent, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Et... je ne veux pas dire par là qu'elle a raison. L'Imperium maîtrisera le pouvoir de la créature et l'utilisera contre nos ennemis. »

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、お前の不認可の異種族が言うことにも一理ある。だが…彼女が正しいと言っているわけではない。帝国は、この生物の力を制御する。そして、それを我々の敵に差し向けるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、お前の不認可の異種族が言うことにも一理ある。だが…彼女が正しいと言っているわけではない。帝国は、この生物の力を制御する。そして、それを我々の敵に差し向けるのだ」

languages.text: "Eure unsanktionierte Xenos hat nicht unrecht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Was ... aber nicht heißt, dass sie recht hat. Das Imperium wird sich die Macht dieser Kreatur zunutze machen. Und sie gegen unsere Feinde einsetzen."
languages.original_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Eure unsanktionierte Xenos hat nicht unrecht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Was ... aber nicht heißt, dass sie recht hat. Das Imperium wird sich die Macht dieser Kreatur zunutze machen. Und sie gegen unsere Feinde einsetzen."

languages.text: “你那个非法异形说的话确实有道理，行商浪人。不过……这并不等于她的看法是对的。帝国会驾驭这种生物的力量，利用它来对付我们的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."

traits.locale_text: “你那个非法异形说的话确实有道理，行商浪人。不过……这并不等于她的看法是对的。帝国会驾驭这种生物的力量，利用它来对付我们的敌人。”

languages.text: "Onaysız zenon doğru bir noktaya değindi Hür Tacir. Haklı olduğunu söylemiyorum tabii. İmparatorluk, bu yaratığın gücünü ele geçirecek ve onu düşmanlarımıza karşı kullanacak."
languages.original_text: "Your unsanctioned xenos has a point, Rogue Trader. Which... isn't the same as saying she is right. The Imperium will harness this creature's power. And turn it against our enemies."
